success.title: Success!
success.description: Thank you for your inquiry, your form will be reviewed, please wait! :)

failed.title: Something went wrong, please try again!

greeting.mission: Our office is not only about our staff, but first and foremost about our clients who have trusted in our many years of experience and individual approach.

leasing.title: Leasing
leasing.description: Does your company need expansion? Need cars, offices? We can help you with that! We will find the perfect conditions for you and arrange everything.

ipoteka.title: Mortgage Loans
ipoteka.description: We will analyze all the conditions and help you with all the questions.

insurance.title: Insurance
insurance.description: We specialize in diverse offers, namely: all types of auto insurance, travel, property insurance for owners and renters, medical subscriptions.

investment.title: Investments
investment.description: Want your money to work for you? We can arrange that, financial consultations and assistance in capital investment!

approach.title: Approach
approach.description: Individual approach to each client and their requests

time.title: Time
time.description: Time saving - you don't need to look for different specialists each time to solve your request

decision.title: Decisions
decision.description: Thanks to financial consultations, you can make confident and informed decisions taking into account all possible risks

0.title: Can I get an annual insurance for a car with Ukrainian registration?

1.title: How to evaluate the cost of property for insurance?
1.description: The best option is to refer to the documents: how much it was purchased for and the cost of improvements

2.title: How to choose a medical subscription?
2.description: Each package contains different conditions and accordingly a list of doctors to whom it opens access, when issuing, we will discuss with you what suits you best!

3.title: I just bought a car, what insurance do I need?
3.description: To start driving, you need to get the mandatory insurance for all cars in Poland - OS (odpowiedzialność cywilna), it compensates for the damage caused by you to third parties.

4.title: Do you provide insurance for document submission?
4.description: Yes, and we can offer different options for every taste :)

feedback.title: Have questions or want to contact us? :)

select.label: Which service are you interested in? *

textarea.label: Your Message
textarea.description: Describe your request, so we can better understand and quickly find the appropriate solution!
